Method Detail

buildInstance

public static java.lang.Object buildInstance(java.lang.String instanceString,
                                             java.util.Properties properties)
Build and instance of an object based on a string of the form:
  1. classpath -- constructs a new instance
  2. classpath:buildMethod -- calls a static properties-arg or no-arg factory method

Parameters:
instanceString - string of the form classpath[:method]
properties - properties to feed to the constructor or method if accepted.
Returns:
the designated object.

buildInstance

public static java.lang.Object buildInstance(java.lang.String instanceString)
Build and instance of an object based on a string of the form:
  1. classpath -- constructs a new instance
  2. classpath:buildMethod -- calls a static no-arg factory method

Parameters:
instanceString - string of the form classpath[:method]
Returns:
the designated object.

Parameters:
classname - the name of a class.
properties - properties to feed to the constructor or method if accepted.
Returns:
an instance of the class created through its default (no-arg) constructor.

getInstance

public static java.lang.Object getInstance(java.lang.String classname,
                                           java.lang.String buildMethodName,
                                           java.util.Properties properties)
Get an instance of an object based on a static factory method.

Parameters:
classname - the name of a class.
buildMethodName - the static factory method in the class.
properties - properties to feed to the constructor or method if accepted.
Returns:
an object created through the factory method that accepts properties or the no-arg method if properties aren't accepted.
